Text: Oh... Another new location.

This is the Sanctuaryâ€”inside Aurora's memory prison.
Up until a second ago, she and Cid were walking
through darkness in search of the core of her
memories so that they might escape from this place.
So this place is all made from your memories, right?
Yes, that's correct. But...
What's wrong?

This...should be a scene from my life, but I've
never seen these streets before.

Although I can't say that for certain given how few
fragments I do recall...

It doesn't seem possible that the city I knew a
thousand years ago could become so prosperous.

True... It doesn't feel like we've gone back that
far.
I'm not sure what we're seeing here.

The streets of this flourishing city were full with
all manner of shops and people going about their
business.

(It's odd, because if this truly is from my life,
one would think I'd be able to recognize at least
some snippet of it.)

...But standing here worrying about that isn't going
to solve anything. Let's walk a bit more.
Yes, I can imagine so.
By the way, about how we get out of the Sanctuary...

Are you really going to make me explain this again?
I have to say, you certainly know how to make demands
of a lady. Now listen carefully.

There are cores at the center of the Sanctuary, and
these are draining our magic. Break them, and then we
can make our escape.

Oh yeah, I know that much. I was just wondering if
we're headed to the center.

Yes, but in order to make our way forward, we need to
put an end to this memory we're in...

Hehe, I wonder if we'll ever make it out of here. Oh
dear, even you look a little uncertain.
You're enjoying this, aren't you.

And just for the record: I'm more annoyed than I am
worried.

Annoyed? My, so blunt. Shouldn't you try to put on
a more stoic face in front of a girl?

...Oh, but that isn't to say I dislike that frank,
unaffected part of you.
Thanks.

Say, don't you think there are an awful lot of stores
here? I see cafes, restaurants, and even stylish
boutiques.

In the city I knew, we were lucky to have at the most
two or three businesses even in the center of town.
Yeah, I wouldn't really know about that.
...This seems like a pretty normal city to me.
Oh? So all of this must be very familiar to you.
Yeah, I guess so.

Maybe you've even had a nice beverage at a cafe like
that one over there...?

Oh, you mean Tuna King. I go there all the time.
Their tuna sandwiches are pretty addictive.

What about that over there? Is that a shop, too? I
wonder what they sell.

Triangle-shaped things...with white circles on top?
Whatever they are, everyone seems quite pleased with
them.

That's ice cream. It's cold and sweet, basically a
dessert.
Oh, I see... I wonder if it really tastes that good.
You want some?

Huh? N-No, that's not what I meant. I was simply
speculating about the taste.
...Really? Okay, then.

Is eating while you walk the correct way to enjoy
this "ice cream"? That IS what everyone is doing,
even the children.

Hmm, yeah, I suppose you could say that...? More like
you can eat it on the go if you want.

I take it you "eat it on the go", too? Like those
children there?

Well...I've done that couple of times, yeah. Is all
this really that interesting?
Yes, it is. Very much so.

Well, if you're that curious, how about we go have a
look?

Huh...? Oh, I...think I'll pass. I don't even know
what they have.
Hey, stop that! Donâ€™t run!
Ack?!
*gasp*
Waaah! My ice cream fell!
Tsk, that's why I told you not to run.

I'm terribly sorry about that. Did you get any on
you?

...No, it looks like I'm fine. Please don't worry
about it.
My apologies again for the trouble...

That kid wasn't you, huh. She didn't look like you at
all.
That startled me.
Huh?
I wasn't expecting anyone to bump into me.
...And yet you seem kinda happy about it, huh?
Hehe, do I? Perhaps you're right.
...This is a lovely city.
Huh? Where did that come from?
Well, I've never seen anything like all this before.

The fountain in the middle of town, the fashionable
shops, the smiling people walking aboutâ€”isn't it
wonderful?

So many living, breathing people, and none of them
are doing awful things to me...!
That's an odd thing to be impressed with.

But I'm walking about like normal and no one is
saying a thing to me...! I'm so happy I might even
start singing!
That would definitely turn some heads your way...

The I suppose I'll settle for dancing instead. Care
to join me?
Nah, I'm gonna have to pass on that.
Huh... Somethin' about that stall...
Oh, is something wrong?
Aha, I knew it. I've seen those keychains before.
Keywhats...? What are those? Some kind of accessory?

Hmm... This resembles the hero Olivier's sword and
the left arm of the demon, Diablos. Am I seeing this
right?

If so, then all of this around us now could not be
from 1,000 years agoâ€”in short, this is likely not one
of my memories.

So...we're in one of mine? That would mean this is
Lindwurm.
Curious... This is starting to make a bit more sense.

And given how the cores function, that is certainly
within the realm of reason.
So, I take it you're well-acquainted with this city?

I wouldn't say I know it like the back of my hand,
but I'm somewhat familiar with it.

Well, since we're here, would you mind showing me
around?

I want learn more about the world a millennium after
my time.

Seriously? I think we should be tryin' to get outta
here, asap... So what, you wanna walk around some
more?

Oh, don't look so put out. If this is your memory,
then wouldn't you showing me around be exactly what
we need to escape?
Do you really think it'll be that easy?

All right, then maybe I'll go wander about on my own,
then.
And what do you think's gonna happen if we split up?
Who knows? I haven't the faintest idea.
Okay, but only for a little while.
Okay, let's start by going that wayâ€”
Is this the part where you offer me your arm?
Maybe if you were a lost child.
Hehe, well, no matter. Let's be off...
...Off to my first day in the world of the future!
